argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | srhmsubc.s | |- A. r e. S r e. Ring |
| 2 |  | srhmsubc.c | |- C = ( U i^i S ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_srhmsubclem1 | |- ( X e. C -> X e. ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( U e. V /\ X e. C ) -> X e. ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( RingCat ` U ) = ( RingCat ` U ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( RingCat ` U ) ) = ( Base ` ( RingCat ` U ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_id | |- ( U e. V -> U e. V ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_ringcbas | |- ( U e. V -> ( Base ` ( RingCat ` U ) ) = ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( U e. V /\ X e. C ) -> ( Base ` ( RingCat ` U ) ) = ( U i^i Ring ) ) |
| 10 | 4, 9 | #P_eleqtrrd | |- ( ( U e. V /\ X e. C ) -> X e. ( Base ` ( RingCat ` U ) ) ) |
